marklogic.body:
Your point is well taken but also supports what I have been saying. As far as global emissions are concerned, we are better Off Burning our coal here in the U.S. where we actually have better emissions control technology.
If one takes a historical perspective, coal fired electric plants resulted in cleaner air even before regulations, as this electricity displaced direct wood and coal Heating, fuel oil lighting and other dirtier energy and Heat sources.
